title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Beat the eggs and mix with the cheese and pepper.
Toss the spaghetti with the pancetta and remove from heat.
Add the egg and cheese mixture and stir quickly.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with yogurt and tikka masala paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill the chicken until slightly charred.
Fry the onions and garlic until soft.
Add the tomato puree and cook for a few minutes.
Add the cream and grilled chicken, simmer for 10 minutes.
